department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Public Health Agency of Canada has a requirement for supply and delivery of a  Rocker bioreactor platform (2-25L capacity).
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 19, 2024 at 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: The bid will remain open for  18 days
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

* **Title:** 6D063-235222 Rocker Bioreactor Platform
* **Reference Number:** WS4408965173-Doc4408990033
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4408965173
* **Publication Date:** February 1, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 19, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** February 13, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 14, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Cancelled

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** GD
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Goods and Services

* **UNSバス CPS Description:** Cell and Tissue Culture Products
* **Procurement of:** Rocker Bioreactor Platform (2-25L capacity)
* **Delivery Location:** Winnipeg, Canada

#### Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Contact Information

* For more information, please contact:
	+ Name: Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tenders and Attachments

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 19, 2024 at 1400 EST.
* All
